body: I don't use csh, but I just noticed that `setup-env.csh` doesn't do anything unless `SPACK_ROOT` is set. Is there no way to determine `SPACK_ROOT` automatically? At the very least, it should print a warning message saying that nothing was done and you need to define `SPACK_ROOT`.
title: setup-env.csh doesn't do anything if SPACK_ROOT is unset
